## Vectors in R

```{r}
marmots <- c("blue", "green", 4, "yellow", TRUE)

class(marmots)
# all same class of "characters"
marmots
```

Create a numeric Vector

```{r}
pika <- c(12.4, 6.5, 4.5, 3.2, 5.6)

class(pika)
```

```{r}
bear <- c(20L, 3L, 5L, 18L)
```
